name: LUCID (itch) (Wizard Rabbit)
description:
(GAME IS STILL WIP - SHOULD BE RELEASED BY 8/20/2020)

Every once in a while when the stars align, a dying soul gets its chance to fight for its own existence - you have 10 minutes before your soul leaves your dying body, will you be able to complete the challenge given to you by the gods and save yourself?

LUCID is a short but punishing skill based Boss Rush game in which you have to defeat all bosses and claim victory before your time runs out.

CONTROLS:

  • Movement - WASD, Space
  • Left Click - Shoot
  • Right Click - Close Eye (what I don't see cant hurt me)
  • 1,2,3,4 - Equip Eyes
